trialText: 14 day free trial. No credit card required.

developers.title: Built for Developers
developers.subtitle: Built on top of a extensible data model, Gather is designed to be easy to integrate and easy to extend.

codeSamples.title: Gather.js
API
codeSamples.code:
curl https://api.gatherdata.co/models/account/records \
  -d id="account_123"
  -d name="Lovelace, Inc"
  -d country="England"

{
    "id": "account_123",
    "name": "Lovelace, Inc",
    "country": "England",
}

customers.title: Powering support for thousands of customers across the world

testimonials.testimonial: Gather enabled our team to streamline support and internal processes, reducing pressure on our engineering team to deliver features for support and reducing ramp up time for new support hires, ultimately leading to more efficient and happier team members. We wouldn’t have been able to keep up with our level of support and scale as quickly without Gather.
testimonials.name: Karim Butt

footerCta.title: Let's get started
footerCta.subtitle: 14 day free trial. No credit card required.

featureDataEngine.title: Data Engine
featureDataEngine.copy: Identify who your at risk, stable, best and champion customers are so you can focus your attention on the customers who need it most.
